definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: He tore it up and rolled it into pipe spills.
sentences.chinese: 他把它撕碎，捲成了點板煙的紙捻兒。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that the Cavendish is facing a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 無可質疑地，板煙正面臨真正的問題。

sentences.english: Many of the genes which could have saved the Cavendish may already have been lost.
sentences.chinese: 許多能夠拯救板煙香蕉的基因已經沒了。

sentences.english: However, the real problem lies with the Cavendish , say biologists.
sentences.chinese: 然而生物學家表示，真正的問題在板煙香蕉。
